title: Claim
description: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
flavorText: "Take back what is ours!" - Captain Arrika

title: Final Spark
description: Deal 4 to an enemy.
flavorText: "I've hidden my light for my whole life. What would happen if they knew... if *I* knew what I could really do?" - Lux

title: Battlefield Prowess
description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
flavorText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle

title: Chain Vest
description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
flavorText: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.

title: Cithria of Cloudfield
flavorText: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."

title: Dragon Chow
description: When you play a Dragon, it <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> me and you draw 1.
flavorText: "That shriek you hear from way up high? That's no bird, my boy. That's the cry of a hunting dragon." - Demacian farmer

title: Fleetfeather Tracker
description: When you summon another ally, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
flavorText: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.

title: Mageseeker Conservator
description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand a 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
flavorText:
"Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens."
- Mageseeker's Handbook

title: Penitent Squire
description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an Elite, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tattered Banner</style></link> in hand.
flavorText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.

title: Plucky Poro
flavorText: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant

title: Radiant Strike
description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian

title: Ranger's Resolve
description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round.
flavorText: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden

title: Tattered Banner
description: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
flavorText: "Form up, on me!" - Silverwing Vanguard

title: Battlesmith
description: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: Wars are won in the forge.

title: Blinding Assault
description: Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder

title: Brightsteel Protector
description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
flavorText: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III

title: Dragonguard Lieutenant
description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
flavorText: "When I lost my comrades in arms at Wrenwall, I thought I had also lost my resolve... but it turns out there is nothing that a fight can't stir up in an old soldier."

title: Egghead Researcher
description: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
flavorText:
Dragon Egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco Murmurationis) 
Location: Recovered by researcher Anden Mayne on Expedition. 
Notes: Gestation period unknown. Incubation continued. Recent movement observed within shell. Egg responds to heat, light, hammer. Current studies inconclusive. 
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

title: Honored Lord
description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
flavorText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.

title: Lucian
flavorText: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."

title: Lucian
description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
flavorText: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."

title: Mageseeker Persuader
description: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"

title: Purify
description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
flavorText:
"Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else."
- The Mageseekers' Handbook

title: Quinn's Blinding Assault
description:
Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Quinn</style></link> in your deck.
flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder

title: Sharpsight
description: Give an ally +2|+2 and "I can block units with <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>" this round.
flavorText: Any who would dare breach Demacia's walls will find a full company awaiting them--forewarned and heavily armed.

title: Single Combat
description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
flavorText: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora

title: Stony Suppressor
description: ALL spells cost 1 more.
flavorText: What begins as a shapeless, rough-hewn block of petricite quickly becomes something more under the clever hands of its sculptor. That is when a piece truly starts to come to life.

title: Valor
flavorText: Those who meet him swear they see a glimmer of something more in those sharp eyes, a shrewd intelligence that far surpasses any ordinary bird of prey.

title: Vanguard Defender
flavorText: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."

title: Vanguard Lookout
flavorText: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.

title: War Chefs
description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.

title: Cataclysm
description: An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV

title: Confront
description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
flavorText: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana

title: Dauntless Vanguard
flavorText: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.

title: Dawnspeakers
description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"

title: En Garde
description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
flavorText: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora

title: Fiora
flavorText: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."

title: Fiora
description: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game. <style=Variable></style>
flavorText: "... and now I know."

title: Greenfang Warden
flavorText: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."

title: Jarvan IV's Cataclysm
description:
An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link> in your deck.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV

title: Laurent Duelist
description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
flavorText: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian ensign

title: Laurent Protege
flavorText: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper

title: Loyal Badgerbear
flavorText: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.

title: Lucian's Relentless Pursuit
description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> in your deck.
flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

title: Lux's Prismatic Barrier
description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lux</style></link> in your deck.
flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

title: Mageseeker Investigator
description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Detain</style></link> in hand once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."

title: Mobilize
description: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
flavorText: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen

title: Prismatic Barrier
description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

title: Relentless Pursuit
description: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

title: Senna, Sentinel of Light
description: The first time an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> dies, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
flavorText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."

title: Shyvana's Confront
description:
Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Shyvana</style></link> in your deck.
flavorText: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana

title: Strafing Strike
description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 2.
flavorText: When knight and dragon separated, panting and wounded, the latter seemed reinvigorated. It smelled blood, and was eager for more.

title: Succession
description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
flavorText: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.

title: The Grand Plaza
description: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
flavorText: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.

title: Vanguard Redeemer
description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"

title: Vanguard Sergeant
description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>For Demacia!</style></link> in hand.
flavorText: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian ensign

title: Dragon Shyvana
description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +2|+2 this round and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Strafing Strike</style></link> in hand.
flavorText:
"The first time I witnessed her transformation, I beheld her with revulsion. There was Yvva, replete in fire and fury! If only I had known then what I know now--that she would become our sister in arms, an exemplary soldier... and my dear, dear friend."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall

title: Fiora's Riposte
description:
Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fiora</style></link> in your deck.
flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

title: Gallant Rider
description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Vanguard Cavalry</style></link>.
flavorText: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.

title: Golden Aegis
description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
flavorText: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV

title: Grizzled Ranger
description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Loyal Badgerbear</style></link>.
flavorText: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."

title: Laurent Bladekeeper
description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +2|+2.
flavorText: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."

title: Laurent Chevalier
description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create in hand another <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> follower from your regions.
flavorText: "...Good grief." - Fiora

title: Mageseeker Inciter
description: Grant me +2|+2 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook

title: Riposte
description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

title: Shyvana
description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"On the one hand, she is, by her very nature, our most hated foe, her kind having historically brought only anguish to Demacia. On the other, she is trusted by the Prince, and seems to have all the makings of a determined soldier and valuable ally. I only hope that she does not betray the trust we have placed in her."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall

title: Silverwing Diver
flavorText: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.

title: Silverwing Vanguard
description: When I'm summoned, summon an exact copy of me.
flavorText: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.

title: Stand Alone
description: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
flavorText: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.

title: Vanguard Bannerman
description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard

title: Vanguard Firstblade
description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +2|+2.
flavorText: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.

title: Vanguard Squire
description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire

title: Concerted Strike
description: Pick an enemy. 2 allies <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> it.
flavorText: "With me, as one!" - Greenfang Warden

title: Detain
description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a unit.
flavorText: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader

title: Garen
flavorText: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.

title: Garen
description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
flavorText: "You think me rigid. Single-minded. Predictable. I am rigid, for nothing can sway me. I am single-minded, for I believe in Demacia. And I am predictable, for I will surely defeat you.”

title: Greathorn Companion
flavorText: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.

title: Quinn
description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
flavorText: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight

title: Quinn
description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
flavorText: "I'll follow your lead, Valor!"

title: Radiant Guardian
description: When I'm summoned, grant me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian ensign

title: Screeching Dragon
flavorText: All creatures are fiercely protective of their young, but few are as well equipped to deal with would-be threats as a dragon.

title: Swiftwing Lancer
description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a random Elite in hand.
flavorText: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen

title: Vanguard Cavalry
flavorText: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.

title: Ardent Tracker
description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: Though the Noxians had laid their trap well, still no-one knew the woods better than Demacia's scouts. Every snapped branch, every footprint was a clue that led them closer to their prince.

title: Back to Back
description: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion

title: Cithria the Bold
description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
flavorText: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”

title: Dragonguard Lookout
description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
flavorText:
"There in the distance! Is that...?"
"Looks like it."
"How can you be sure?"
"Oh, there's no mistaking them. Cover your ears. This will be loud." - Anden and Yessenia

title: For Demacia!
description: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant

title: Genevieve Elmheart
description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.

title: Jarvan IV
description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
flavorText: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.

title: Jarvan IV
description:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Cataclysm</style></link> in hand.
When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
flavorText: But the Noxians did fail to account for the young prince's sheer strength and uncompromising will. They paid for this miscalculation in blood.

title: Lux
description: When you cast 6+ mana of spells, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand. <style=Variable></style>
flavorText: "No more holding back!"

title: Lux
flavorText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"

title: Molten Breath
description: An ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the two <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies.
flavorText: For centuries, the Demacians only knew of a dragon's fury through legend. Wrenwall changed that.

title: Redoubled Valor
description: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
flavorText: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.

title: Remembrance
description: Costs 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
flavorText: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian

title: Towering Stonehorn
description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
flavorText: The great Stonehorns are reputed to have come from the time the petricite forest was young, their spreading antlers made of a material similar to those now-ancient trees.

title: King Jarvan III
description:
When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link>. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link> this round.
flavorText: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc

title: Stalking Broodmother
flavorText: "Careful, soldiers! If we tread carefully and don't disturb the nest, we can keep the mother dragon on the defensive. If we rile her up any further... Well, you'll want to be ready to run." - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

title: Captain Arrika
description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
flavorText: As a child, Arrika saw firsthand the devastation Noxus could inflict as it laid waste to her home. When she enlisted in the military, she vowed never to let the Noxian flag fly over Demacian land, or leave another child orphaned.

title: For The Fallen
description:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
flavorText: "If a soldier falls, another must take their place. Our banner must never fall." - Garen

title: Garen's Judgment
description:
A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Garen</style></link> in your deck.
flavorText: Justice always comes full circle.

title: Judgment
description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
flavorText: Justice always comes full circle.

title: Reinforcements
description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguards</style></link>, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
flavorText:
"Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us."
- The Vanguard's Code

title: Tianna Crownguard
description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
flavorText: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”

title: Unyielding Spirit
description: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
flavorText: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.

title: Brightsteel Formation
description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give all allies <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
flavorText: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen

title: Kadregrin the Infernal
description: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
flavorText: When Demacia underwent a sudden spate of dragon attacks, Shyvana knew that Kadregrin the Infernal was to blame. Other dragons, inspired by his bold nature and powerful flame, drove the Demacians to fear.

title: Cithria, Lady of Clouds
description: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
flavorText: "Who else could Demacia send to save her prince than the Lady of Clouds herself?" - King Jarvan III
